summary: The move continues a pattern by the U.S. securities regulator to deny or not take action on all spot bitcoin ETF applications.
title: SEC Delays Spot Bitcoin ETF Offerings From WisdomTree and One River
content: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has delayed decisions on applications for spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds from WisdomTree Investments (WETF) and One River Asset Management, according to separate filings Monday.
